FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Research Labs
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: Scienctists spend their days researching here. +.5 base research production.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Indoor Hydroponics
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: Food is produced indoors, protecting it from the harshes from the world. +.5 base food production.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Firearms Factory
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: A factory that produces mass quantities of firearms. +.5 base weapon production.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Rimazon Warehouse
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: A warehouse stocked full of goods marked to be shipped. +20 tithe modifier, +5% base tax.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: In-House Merc Company
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: Barracks for an in-house mercenary company. They will provide security for the colony. +1 military level, -10% tax. 200 Silver per tax period upkeep.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Adult Entertainment Centre
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: A place for the local people to spend a dime and have a good time. +.5 base happiness a day.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Forced Work Camps
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: Put those prisoners to work and increase your production! +2 max workers, +.5 unrest a day, -25% unrest loss a day.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Artillery Outpost
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: When this building is built, an artillery strike can be called for a cost in the military menu. +1 Military Level. 300 silver per tax period upkeep.
